data.description:
EOLIA is a Hand Tracking single-player fantasy adventure in the award-winning Rhythm of the Universe Series. Travel to the deserts of Eolia as Conga Dholak; a Modus determined to save the land from the great storm.

Features:

- Rich Lore: Follow the inhabitants of Eolia telling the story of Salius Locrius and Nagrus Mohre, the great storm that left destruction in its wake.

- “Hands-First” Design: Perform instruments, collect items, ride your mighty steed, and more.

- Over 300 Items: Gather useful consumables, collectibles, and play melodies to unlock musical superpowers

- Achievements: Solve challenging puzzles to explore Eolia.

- Family Friendly: Great for Gamers and VR newcomers alike.

- Gaming for Good: Every purchase benefits climate change initiatives, with a portion of proceeds going directly to relevant Nonprofits.

- Developed in Unreal and Wwise

Dear Adventurers of Eolia, 

We're thrilled to share all the fantastic new additions and upgrades we've been working on for the Eolia Quena Requiem update! Here's what you can expect: 
1. New Level - Quena's Requiem: This enthralling new level can be accessed right from the Tuvanian Church and is also a major part of your main quest. I can't wait for you to explore it! 2. Handtracking Upgrade: Expect a significant boost in the stability and usability of hand-tracking. It's smoother and more intuitive than ever! 
3. More Gameplay: The adventure has been stretched, promising an average playtime of 8+ hours. For the completionists, prepare for a 15+ hour deep-dive into Eolia's world! 
4. Simplified Chinese Subtitles: Ni Hao! We've added subtitles in Simplified Chinese. More language options are just around the corner. 
5. Quest Pro Update & Fidelity Increase: We've fine-tuned the Quest Pro for an even more immersive experience. 
6. Revamped Tutorial Level: Access an upgraded tutorial level via the Main Menu. Perfect for new players or anyone needing a quick refresher. 
7. Enhanced Challenges: We've ramped up the Lhargo Run and added a twist to the Nahgrus Mohre tornado storm for an extra dose of adrenaline. 
8. Memori Modus Puzzle Upgrade: We've tweaked this puzzle to make it accessible and enjoyable for even more users. 
9. Improved Tools: The functionality of your Flute (super-powers), Journal (options), and Satchel (inventory bag) has been greatly improved for a better gaming experience. 
10. Audio-Visual Upgrades: Expect a visual treat and enhanced audio experience across all maps. 
11. Rare Collectables: We've sprinkled rare collectibles across Eolia, with an increased chance to find them all. This one's dedicated to our most devoted fans! 
12. Katarian Gloves Usability: Both single and double-handed Katarian gloves have been revamped for better far-field grab ability. And last, but definitely not least... 
13. Community Feedback Improvements: A massive thanks to our wonderful Discord community for all the valuable feedback! We've made several improvements based on your suggestions. 

The ROTU team appreciates each and every one of you for helping us refine the world of Eolia. We're so excited for you to experience all these changes! Thanks for adventuring with us. Happy Gaming! Jason Parks CEO, ROTU.com
fixed bug where if we go into the tutorial level after playing the main game, the user may lose all items and only spawn with a full flute.

ATTENTION ALL MODUS!

I want to thank every user for playing Eolia and for the support our community has shared.
Since Eolia's launch on September 1st, the ROTU team has been working diligently to incorporate feedback from our community.

I'm happy to announce our first update. Below is a little of what you will find:
-Graphic quality upgrades
-More Tutorialization
-Upgraded Lhargo riding and added riding position gizmo
-Journal is deployed directly from the toolbar now
-Bottle spawning bug was fixed; that was a weird one!
-Padlocks on lock boxes glow when you're holding a key
-Straightforward dialog interactions
-Better Glove Station interactions
-HUD notifications when lost items return to the inventory
-Optimized NPC interactions
-Updated Missions descriptions
-Updated Maps in Journal and added a Flute tutorial page
-Journal opens to the mission log for better clarity on what to do next
-Fixed power joint occasional missing in Memori Modus
-Added Flute tutorial in Journal
-Included more hints to solve Oasis Mixing Machine Puzzle
-small audio update in Sonarían Tower

We will continue to do our best to improve Eolia by listening to our users and providing frequent updates! Please keep sending suggestions for Eolia through www.ROTU.com, Discord, or info@rotu.com.

Sincerely,
Jason Parks, Producer
